revised_title: Polynomial Conserved Densities for the Sine-Gordon Equations
tldr: The authors investigate the conditions for the existence of polynomial conserved densities for the generalized sine-Gordon equation. They prove that the existence of these densities is connected to the existence of auto-Backlund transformations and the inverse scattering method. The study focuses on polynomial conserved densities of rank greater than 2 and provides necessary conditions for their existence.
